verses.verse: And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> were gathered <S%H6817>together<s%>, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>; and they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%>, Wherefore passedst thou <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and didst not <S%H7121>call<s%> us to <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H8313>thee<s%>? we will burn thy <S%H1004>house<s%> upon thee with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5971>them<s%>, I and my people <S%H1961>were<s%> at <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H376>strife<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>; and when I <S%H2199>called<s%> <S%H3467>you<s%>, ye saved me not out of their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And when I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that ye <S%H3467>saved<s%> me <S%H7760>not<s%>, I put my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>: wherefore then are ye come <S%H5927>up<s%> unto me this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to fight against <S%H3898>me<s%>?

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>; and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, because they <S%H559>said<s%>, Ye are <S%H6412>fugitives<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, ye <S%H1568>Gileadites<s%>, in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.

And the <S%H1568>Gileadites<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4569>fords<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> against the <S%H669>Ephraimites<s%>. And it was <S%H6412>so<s%>, that, when any of the fugitives of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let me go <S%H5674>over<s%>, the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H673>him<s%>, Art thou an Ephraimite? If he <S%H559>said<s%>, Nay;

then <S%H559>said<s%> they unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Say now <S%H7641>Shibboleth<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5451>Sibboleth<s%>; for he could not <S%H3559>frame<s%> to <S%H1696>pronounce<s%> it <S%H3559>right<s%>: then they <S%H270>laid<s%> hold on <S%H7819>him<s%>, and slew him at the <S%H4569>fords<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>. And there <S%H5307>fell<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>. Then <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in one of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

And he had <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>; and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%>, and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> he <S%H935>brought<s%> in from <S%H2351>abroad<s%> for his <S%H1121>sons<s%>. And he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
And <S%H356>Elon<s%> the <S%H2075>Zebulunite<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H357>Aijalon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>.

And he had <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>' sons, that <S%H7392>rode<s%> on threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> ass <S%H5895>colts<s%>: and he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And <S%H5658>Abdon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1985>Hillel<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H6552>Pirathon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%>.
